org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs

Class EncFSProgressListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mrpdaemon.sec.encfs.EncFSProgressListener

  • public abstract class EncFSProgressListener
extends Object
    Class representing a progress listener for long running operations

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int FILE_PROCESS_EVENT
      Event notifying that a single file or directory has been processed.
      static int FILES_COUNTED_EVENT
      Event notifying that the number of affected files/directories have been counted.
      static int NEW_FILE_EVENT
      Event notifying that a new file has started to be processed
      static int OP_COMPLETE_EVENT
      Event notifying completion of the whole operation.

      EncFSProgressListener()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getCurrentFile()
      Get the name of the current file being operated on
      int getNumFiles()
      Get the total number of files that the operation will proceed on.
      abstract void handleEvent(int eventType)
      Method that must be overridden by extending class to handle events posted to the event listener

    • Method Detail

      • handleEvent

        public abstract void handleEvent(int eventType)
        Method that must be overridden by extending class to handle events posted to the event listener
        Parameters:
        eventType - Type of the event that just occured

      • getCurrentFile

        public String getCurrentFile()
        Get the name of the current file being operated on
        Returns:
        name of the current file being operated on

      • getNumFiles

        public int getNumFiles()
        Get the total number of files that the operation will proceed on. Note that this value is undefined until a FILES_COUNTED_EVENT is posted first
        Returns:
        total number of files that the operation will proceed on
